title: Crossing Borders – Diljit Dosanjh interviewed by Panos A. Panay, President of the Recording Academy | Billboard Summit at NXNE
description: In his first English-language interview, global superstar Diljit Dosanjh speaks with Panos A. Panay, President of the Grammys, about breaking language barriers and bringing Punjabi culture to the world. This powerful fireside chat explores Diljit’s rise, his connection with international audiences, and his cultural mission from India to sold-out arenas in Canada and beyond.
author: Stefanie Tanaka
excerpt: In his first English-language interview, global superstar Diljit Dosanjh speaks with Panos A. Panay, President of the Grammys.

html:
Skip to main content

Video

In his first English-language interview, global superstar Diljit Dosanjh speaks with Panos A. Panay, President of the Grammys, about breaking language barriers and bringing Punjabi culture to the world. This powerful fireside chat explores Diljit’s rise, his connection with international audiences, and his cultural mission from India to sold-out arenas in Canada and beyond.
